name: restb-frontend
description: Frontend for RestB application using Pug templating

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile-pug && npm run copy-assets && npm run create-root-index
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist -p 3055
scripts.devmon: npm run build && (npm run watch & npx serve dist -p 3055)
scripts.build:watch: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch src/assets --watch dist --ext pug,css,js,html --exec 'npm run build'
